Timer.Timer

機能/意味
Constructing a Timer object
タイプ
Timerクラスのコンストラクタ
構文
Timer(owner, actionname="action")
引数
owner 　Specify where the event occurs.
actionname 　In the object where the event specified by owner occurs, specify the name of the method that receives the event. If an empty string is specified, owner will be considered as a method, and owner will be called directly for each event cycle.
戻り値
なし (void)
説明
　Constructs a Timer class object.
　Initially, the interval property is 1000 and the enabled property is false.
